summary: This is a simple texture recoloring. Tired of the silver imperial crest on the main menu? Let\'s change that!
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple texture recoloring. Tired of the silver imperial crest on the main menu? Let\'s change that!

I. COLORS:

- Gold
- Jade

II. INSTALLATION:

1.) Add the mod to Nexus Mod Manager, activate, and install.

Or

1.) Download the .rar file.
2.) Extract contents to your Skyrim data folder. (Commonly found at \"C:/Program Files/Valve/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data\".)

III. UNINSTALLATION:

1.) Click the deactivate button in Nexus Mod Manager.

Or

1.) Navigate to your Skyrim folder.
2.) Delete \"logo02_d.dds\" from the \"Data/textures/interface/objects/\" folder.

IV. NOTE ABOUT EXTRA RECOLORS ARCHIVE:

When editing the textures I noticed there were two logo dds files but only the second is used, the first appears to be the Imperial Crest but in complete form (Not broken as it appears on the main menu.) however I\'m not sure what it\'s used for. It may be for an in-game item or decoration I haven\'t seen at the time of writing this. I modified the colors of these two but in order to avoid undesirable coloring of these items from the main mod I\'m uploading them in a separate archive.

V. COMPATIBILITIES:

Should be compatible with any mod that doesn\'t remove the imperial crest from the main menu or modify the \"logo02_d.dds\" file. For the extra recolors these should be compatible with any mod that doesn\'t overwrite the \"logo01_d.dds\" file.

VI. PERMISSIONS:

Since this really is just a regular texture recoloring feel free to include it in your mod/distribute it with your mod/change it as you like. If you reupload it please give me credit, that\'s all I ask. Thank you.

VII. TO DO LIST:

- Add additional colors.
- Figure out how to add transparency to make \"jewel\" versions?

VIII. VERSION HISTORY:

v1.0 - Added Gold, Jade colors. Uploaded extras archive with Gold and Jade colors for full imperial crest.
author: SamusKnight2K
